description: Achieved universal GPU support and massive performance wins in Miller. Fixed GPU detection on Windows RTX 4080 (PyTorch 2.9.1+cu130). Optimized LanceDB writes from 352 individual operations to 7 bulk batches, improving from 45.21s to 0.95s (47.6x faster, 73.5% → 6.6% of total time). Overall indexing speedup 4.3x (61.51s → 14.46s, throughput 5.7 → 24.3 files/sec). Added auto-detection for ROCm (AMD on Linux) and XPU (Intel Arc), completing universal GPU coverage: CUDA, ROCm, XPU, MPS, DirectML, CPU. Fixed file watcher ignore patterns and CI workflow maturin virtualenv requirements. System now well-balanced across file discovery (28.9%), embeddings (29.1%), extraction (18.4%), database writes (22.8%).
